fields.Name: Get SurveyMonkey Responses
fields.Description: Retrieves responses from a SurveyMonkey survey with advanced filtering, pagination, and sorting capabilities. Supports date range filters, status filtering, and automatic pagination through all responses.

fields.Name: SurveyID
fields.Description: The SurveyMonkey survey ID (found in survey URL or API)

fields.Name: AccessToken
fields.Description: SurveyMonkey API access token (get from https://developer.surveymonkey.com/apps/)

fields.Name: PageSize
fields.Description: Number of responses per page (1-1000, default 100)

fields.Name: Page
fields.Description: Page number to retrieve (1-based, default 1)

fields.Name: StartCreatedAt
fields.Description: Filter responses created on or after this date (ISO 8601 format)

fields.Name: EndCreatedAt
fields.Description: Filter responses created before this date (ISO 8601 format)

fields.Name: StartModifiedAt
fields.Description: Filter responses modified on or after this date (ISO 8601 format)

fields.Name: EndModifiedAt
fields.Description: Filter responses modified before this date (ISO 8601 format)

fields.Name: SortOrder
fields.Description: Sort direction: 'ASC' or 'DESC' (default: DESC)

fields.Name: SortBy
fields.Description: Field to sort by: 'date_modified' or 'date_created' (default: date_modified)

fields.Name: Status
fields.Description: Filter by response status: 'completed', 'partial', 'overquota', 'disqualified' (comma-separated for multiple)

fields.Name: GetAllPages
fields.Description: If true, automatically fetch all pages of responses (up to MaxResponses)

fields.Name: MaxResponses
fields.Description: Maximum number of responses to retrieve when GetAllPages is true (default 10000)

fields.Name: Responses
fields.Description: Array of response objects with all answers, metadata, and submission details

fields.Name: TotalResponses
fields.Description: Total number of responses available matching the criteria

fields.Name: Count
fields.Description: Number of responses returned in this request

fields.Name: CurrentPage
fields.Description: Current page number

fields.Name: TotalPages
fields.Description: Total number of pages available

fields.Name: HasMore
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if more pages are available
Responses retrieved successfully
SurveyID parameter is required
AccessToken parameter is required
Context user is required for SurveyMonkey API calls
Unexpected error occurred

fields.Name: Get Single SurveyMonkey Response
fields.Description: Retrieves details of a specific SurveyMonkey response by its unique response ID. Includes all answers, metadata, recipient information, and response timing data.

fields.Name: SurveyID
fields.Description: The SurveyMonkey survey ID

fields.Name: ResponseID
fields.Description: The unique response ID to retrieve

fields.Name: AccessToken
fields.Description: SurveyMonkey API access token

fields.Name: Response
fields.Description: Complete response object with all answers and metadata

fields.Name: ResponseID
fields.Description: The response ID

fields.Name: DateCreated
fields.Description: Timestamp when response was created

fields.Name: DateModified
fields.Description: Timestamp when response was last modified

fields.Name: ResponseStatus
fields.Description: Status of the response (completed, partial, overquota, disqualified)

fields.Name: Answers
fields.Description: Array of all answers with question IDs and values

fields.Name: Metadata
fields.Description: Recipient information, collector details, and custom variables

fields.Name: IPAddress
fields.Description: IP address of the respondent

fields.Name: TotalTime
fields.Description: Total time spent completing the survey in seconds
Response retrieved successfully
SurveyID parameter is required
ResponseID parameter is required
AccessToken parameter is required
Unexpected error occurred

fields.Name: Get SurveyMonkey Response Statistics
fields.Description: Calculates comprehensive statistics from SurveyMonkey responses including completion rates, response trends, answer distributions, and time-based analytics. Perfect for dashboards, reporting, and data analysis.

fields.Name: SurveyID
fields.Description: The SurveyMonkey survey ID

fields.Name: AccessToken
fields.Description: SurveyMonkey API access token

fields.Name: StartCreatedAt
fields.Description: Start date for analysis (ISO 8601 format)

fields.Name: EndCreatedAt
fields.Description: End date for analysis (ISO 8601 format)

fields.Name: MaxResponses
fields.Description: Maximum responses to analyze (default 10000)

fields.Name: IncludeTopAnswers
fields.Description: Calculate most popular answers for each question (default true)

fields.Name: TopAnswersLimit
fields.Description: Number of top answers to return per question (default 10)

fields.Name: Statistics
fields.Description: Complete statistics object with all calculated metrics

fields.Name: TotalResponses
fields.Description: Total number of responses

fields.Name: CompletedResponses
fields.Description: Number of completed responses

fields.Name: PartialResponses
fields.Description: Number of partial/incomplete responses

fields.Name: CompletionRate
fields.Description: Percentage of responses that were completed

fields.Name: AverageCompletionTime
fields.Description: Average time to complete in seconds

fields.Name: ResponsesByDate
fields.Description: Daily breakdown of response counts

fields.Name: DailyBreakdown
fields.Description: Array of daily statistics with date, count, completed, and partial counts

fields.Name: HourlyDistribution
fields.Description: Array showing response distribution by hour of day (0-23)

fields.Name: TopAnswers
fields.Description: Most popular answers by question ID

fields.Name: StatusBreakdown
fields.Description: Response count by status (completed, partial, overquota, disqualified)
Statistics calculated successfully
SurveyID parameter is required
AccessToken parameter is required
Unexpected error occurred

fields.Name: Export SurveyMonkey Responses to CSV
fields.Description: Exports SurveyMonkey responses to CSV format for use in spreadsheets, data analysis tools, or archival. Supports custom delimiters, optional metadata columns, and flexible date filtering.

fields.Name: SurveyID
fields.Description: The SurveyMonkey survey ID

fields.Name: AccessToken
fields.Description: SurveyMonkey API access token

fields.Name: StartCreatedAt
fields.Description: Start date for responses to export (ISO 8601 format)

fields.Name: EndCreatedAt
fields.Description: End date for responses to export (ISO 8601 format)

fields.Name: Status
fields.Description: Filter by response status: 'completed', 'partial', 'overquota', 'disqualified' (comma-separated for multiple)

fields.Name: IncludeMetadata
fields.Description: Include metadata columns (response ID, status, IP address, dates, timing) - default true

fields.Name: Delimiter
fields.Description: CSV delimiter character (default: comma)

fields.Name: MaxResponses
fields.Description: Maximum responses to export (default 10000)

fields.Name: CSVData
fields.Description: CSV formatted string ready for export or storage

fields.Name: RowCount
fields.Description: Number of data rows in the CSV

fields.Name: Headers
fields.Description: Array of column headers

fields.Name: ColumnCount
fields.Description: Number of columns in the CSV

fields.Name: FileSize
fields.Description: Size of CSV data in bytes
CSV export completed successfully
No responses found matching the criteria
SurveyID parameter is required
AccessToken parameter is required
Unexpected error occurred

fields.Name: Watch for New SurveyMonkey Responses
fields.Description: Polls SurveyMonkey for new responses since the last check. Returns only new submissions and updates the last checked timestamp. Ideal for triggering workflows, sending notifications, or syncing data to other systems in real-time.

fields.Name: SurveyID
fields.Description: The SurveyMonkey survey ID to monitor

fields.Name: AccessToken
fields.Description: SurveyMonkey API access token

fields.Name: LastCheckedTimestamp
fields.Description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last check. If not provided, uses DefaultLookbackMinutes.

fields.Name: DefaultLookbackMinutes
fields.Description: If LastCheckedTimestamp not provided, look back this many minutes (default 60)

fields.Name: OnlyCompleted
fields.Description: Only return completed responses (default false)

fields.Name: MaxResponses
fields.Description: Maximum new responses to return (default 1000)

fields.Name: NewResponses
fields.Description: Array of new responses since last check

fields.Name: NewResponseCount
fields.Description: Number of new responses found

fields.Name: CompletedCount
fields.Description: Number of completed responses in the new set

fields.Name: PartialCount
fields.Description: Number of partial responses in the new set

fields.Name: LastChecked
fields.Description: Updated timestamp to use for next check

fields.Name: PreviouslyChecked
fields.Description: The timestamp that was used for this check

fields.Name: ResponsesByStatus
fields.Description: Responses grouped by status (completed, partial, etc.)

fields.Name: ExtractedEmails
fields.Description: Email addresses extracted from responses

fields.Name: HasNewResponses
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if any new responses were found
New responses found and returned
No new responses since last check
SurveyID parameter is required
AccessToken parameter is required
Unexpected error occurred

fields.Name: Get SurveyMonkey Details
fields.Description: Retrieves complete details of a SurveyMonkey survey including title, questions, pages, logic, quota settings, theme, and metadata. Use this to inspect survey configurations, backup survey designs, or analyze survey structure.

fields.Name: SurveyID
fields.Description: The SurveyMonkey survey ID to retrieve

fields.Name: AccessToken
fields.Description: SurveyMonkey API access token

fields.Name: Survey
fields.Description: Complete survey object with all configuration

fields.Name: SurveyID
fields.Description: The survey ID

fields.Name: Title
fields.Description: Survey title

fields.Name: Pages
fields.Description: Array of all survey pages with questions and configuration

fields.Name: Questions
fields.Description: Array of all questions across all pages with types and properties

fields.Name: QuestionCount
fields.Description: Total number of questions in the survey

fields.Name: PageCount
fields.Description: Number of pages in the survey

fields.Name: Language
fields.Description: Survey language code

fields.Name: ResponseCount
fields.Description: Total number of responses collected

fields.Name: DateCreated
fields.Description: Timestamp when survey was created

fields.Name: DateModified
fields.Description: Timestamp when survey was last modified

fields.Name: CustomVariables
fields.Description: Custom variables defined for the survey

fields.Name: Summary
fields.Description: High-level summary with key metrics and information
Survey details retrieved successfully
SurveyID parameter is required
AccessToken parameter is required
Unexpected error occurred

fields.Name: Create SurveyMonkey
fields.Description: Creates a new SurveyMonkey survey with specified title, pages, questions, and settings. Supports all question types including multiple choice, text, rating, matrix, and more. Returns the new survey ID and collector URLs.

fields.Name: AccessToken
fields.Description: SurveyMonkey API access token with create permissions

fields.Name: Title
fields.Description: Title of the survey

fields.Name: Pages
fields.Description: Array of page objects. Each page contains title and questions array. Questions need: family, subtype, heading, and optional answers. Families: single_choice, multiple_choice, matrix, open_ended, demographic, datetime, presentation

fields.Name: Language
fields.Description: Optional survey language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr') - default 'en'

fields.Name: FolderID
fields.Description: Optional folder ID where survey should be created

fields.Name: CustomVariables
fields.Description: Optional custom variables object for advanced tracking

fields.Name: CreateCollector
fields.Description: If true, automatically creates a web link collector for the survey (default true)

fields.Name: Survey
fields.Description: Complete created survey object

fields.Name: SurveyID
fields.Description: The new survey's ID

fields.Name: SurveyURL
fields.Description: URL to view/edit the survey in SurveyMonkey

fields.Name: CollectorURL
fields.Description: Shareable URL for respondents to take the survey (if CreateCollector=true)

fields.Name: Title
fields.Description: The survey's title

fields.Name: QuestionCount
fields.Description: Number of questions in the created survey

fields.Name: PageCount
fields.Description: Number of pages in the created survey
Survey created successfully
AccessToken parameter is required
Title parameter is required
Pages parameter is required and must be a non-empty array
Unexpected error occurred

fields.Name: Update SurveyMonkey
fields.Description: Updates an existing SurveyMonkey survey including title, pages, questions, and settings. Use PATCH mode (default) for safe partial updates or PUT mode for complete replacement. WARNING: PUT mode replaces all survey data - pages and questions not included will be deleted.

fields.Name: SurveyID
fields.Description: The SurveyMonkey survey ID to update

fields.Name: AccessToken
fields.Description: SurveyMonkey API access token with write permissions

fields.Name: UpdateMode
fields.Description: Update strategy: 'PATCH' for partial updates (safe, default) or 'PUT' for complete replacement (DANGEROUS - will delete unspecified pages/questions)

fields.Name: Title
fields.Description: New title for the survey (optional in PATCH mode)

fields.Name: Pages
fields.Description: Array of page objects (optional in PATCH mode, required in PUT mode)

fields.Name: Language
fields.Description: Survey language code to update

fields.Name: CustomVariables
fields.Description: Custom variables to update

fields.Name: Survey
fields.Description: Complete updated survey object

fields.Name: SurveyID
fields.Description: The survey's ID

fields.Name: SurveyURL
fields.Description: URL to view/edit the survey in SurveyMonkey

fields.Name: Title
fields.Description: The survey's title

fields.Name: QuestionCount
fields.Description: Number of questions in the updated survey

fields.Name: PageCount
fields.Description: Number of pages in the updated survey

fields.Name: LastModified
fields.Description: Timestamp of last modification
Survey updated successfully
SurveyID parameter is required
AccessToken parameter is required
Pages parameter is required when UpdateMode is PUT
Unexpected error occurred
